abstract: Google’s Chromecast device and its Android software let you watch videos from your mobile device on a TV or PC monitor.
snippet: Google’s Chromecast device and its Android software let you watch videos from your mobile device on a TV or PC monitor.
lead_paragraph: Q. My seven-inch Android tablet is too small for viewing high-quality movies, so I’m looking for a simple and easy way to stream it to either a TV console or a PC monitor. I have a Chromecast, but do I need any other hardware or software to make it happen?

headline.main: Using Chromecast to Stream Your Tablet on a TV Screen
